text: lelitini bek’eni wisit’i yasigebali፡፡ k’eninimi beleliti wiset’i yasigebali፤ ts’ehayinina ch’erek’animi gera፡፡ hulumi itewesene gize diresi yirot’alu፡፡ yihi getachihu alahi newi፡፡ nigisinawi ye’irisu bicha newi፡፡ ineziyami ke’irisu lela yemitigigezwachewi yetemiri fire shifani inikwa ayinorachewimi፡፡
